text: Wamulongela, “Gweye kuna luwege.” Viyagendelele kugangamiza kamba kweli Petulo ka halwivi, walonga, “Siku kowa msenga wa Mulungu wa kuulanga yali hamoja nayo.”12:15 Kipigiti kija Wayahudi wakala wogelegeza kamba Mulungu komgwaa kila munhu msenga wake wa kuulanga yamwimilize, na msenga ija kolinga na munhu ija yomwimiliza mkihanga na mkiwiliwili.
